long_description: Quick-dry and moisture-wicking performance along with sun protection make the Merrell Ellsworth Dress more than just a sundress. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Halter-style straps connect to straps in the back, creating a design that allows unrestricted shoulder movement. Crossover bustline and high waistband detail create a feminine, flattering shape. Soft polyester/elastane blend feels great next to skin. The Merrell Ellsworth dress features an inner bra that provides support and helps wick moisture with mesh panels to keep you dry from the inside out. Closeout.
short_description: Quick-dry and moisture-wicking performance along with sun protection make the Merrell Ellsworth Dress more than just a sundress.
